question.description:
The vendor name should match the legal entity that is entering the contract with Informa:


Example: "SurveyVendor UK Ltd" and NOT "SurveyVendor"
question.content: Please check the vendor name is correct.

question.description: The business owner or project sponsor, who is a person or group of people at senior management level, responsible for the success of the project and provide necessary guidance and resources to the project team. These individuals may be referred to as the business sponsor, project sponsor, executive sponsor, etc
question.content: Who is the internal Informa business owner sponsoring this vendor?

question.description: Which division holds the risk for this vendor? By selecting a division here you are telling the Privacy team that reporting related to this vendor and it's risks and activities should be attributed to that division. If two divisions jointly and equally own the contract with this vendor then select one and name the other in the box below. If one division owns the relationship but two divisions use the services that should be indicated in the question below.
question.content: Which Informa Division owns and controls the contract/relationship with Vendor?
Which Informa Divisions will the vendor be providing services to? Select all applicable

question.description: Please select the most appropriate type of vendor from the list.
question.content: What sort of supplier is this vendor?

question.description: This will help us to understand if we need to coordinate with the procurement team.

options.option: Procurement are NOT involved in this relationship.
Procurement manage our contract with this vendor to a high degree
The procurement team are helping/have helped to negotiate this relationship.

question.content: What is the status of the vendor with procurement team?

question.description: So that we know who in the procurement team we should contact.
question.content: Within the procurement team who has been your primary contact?
If the vendor has been set-up in Coupa or other Procurement System, please provide the procurement vendor reference ID and system details:

question.description: Who is the vendor's representative for our dealings with them?
question.content: Who is our overall relationship manager/contact for this vendor?
Does the vendor have a dedicated Information Security Lead or team?
Please provide the name and email of the person who is responsible for Information Security at the Vendor end

question.description: These activities typically involve only limited personal data and processing of personal data and so require only limited risk assessment.

options.option: only accessing Informa systems containing audience or colleague data purely for maintenance and troubleshooting.
only processing limited colleague contact/employee data in order to provide login to a platform or for the negotiation or arrangement of the service.
providing a limited duration proof of concept service handling fewer than 10,000 audience records, or fewer than 500 colleague records.
conducting any other activities with personal data.

question.content: Will the vendor be...

question.description:
The engagement or service is the subject of the contract, i.e. the activity you are asking the vendor to carry out on your behalf.

The Engagement should be named descriptively and should distinguish the Engagement under this contract from other Engagements with this vendor.

e.g. "Marketing analytics for logistics events email campaigns" or "Provision of Customer registration platform for European and Asian conferences", "Management of colleague requests for dental benefit payments".
question.content: Please confirm the service/engagement being assessed.

question.description: Which legal entity is given in the contract/agreement? If you cannot see the correct entity on the list please use "Other" to type in the entity and ask the Privacy team to add this entity to the list.
question.content: Which Informa Entity will be contracting with the vendor?

question.description: This should be the category rather than the higher level, whereas the Engagement name allows us to look up a specific service, this grouping allows us to look up groups of similar services so that we can identify where updates to the law regarding this type of service are applicable.
question.content: What type of service is the vendor providing under this contract?

question.friendlyName: What is the purpose of this service?
question.description: A concise description of the type of outcome you're expecting to see, what are you hoping to achieve by engaging with this vendor, what will this service help you to do?
question.content: What is the purpose of this service?

question.description:
Concentrating on how the vendor will interact with any personal information please outline the processing they will conduct.


e.g. The vendor will provide a platform where customers can register for news letters. Informa will provide information about the newsletter and this vendor will create mailing lists by capturing consent and contact information via a webform.


If it helps to clarify the description of the processing of personal data please attach any documentation you feel is relevant but please do not simply refer to the documentation without clarification especially where the service is defined using technical terminology or jargon/acronyms.
question.content: Please describe the service this vendor will provide in this engagement.

question.description: These are activities that may indicate that greater risk is involved in the processing, if the activity has a higher level of inherent Privacy risk we may need to ensure added controls and mitigations are in place, or that we conduct more detailed assurance around this service.
question.content: Will the vendor be conducting any of the following processing activities?

question.description: This may be the same as the vendor contact above or another individual who provides a point of contact for this specific service,
question.content: Who is the contact person at the vendor end?

question.description:
Informa has specific rules relating to the use of AI - whether it is provided for us by the vendor or used by the vendor to provide their service.

Please double check with the Vendor and make sure you know if they use AI internally in order to provide us with the service.
question.content: Will AI be involved in this engagement?

header.name: 4. About the Data involved in this engagement

question.description: Which systems, platforms, databases, cloud storage etc contain the data that is shared with the vendor or received from them?
question.content: Where is the data involved in this activity stored?

question.description: The broad categories of individuals whose data might be involved in the provision of this service.
question.content: Whose data will be shared with the vendor?

question.friendlyName: Categories of data accessed by vendor
question.description: What general types of personal data are involved. If in doubt as to whether the data falls into a particular category, please explain what individual data points are involved.
question.content: What Categories of Data are accessed by the vendor in the provision of this service?

question.description: If you are planning to start with a limited number of records and increase to a higher volume later please make this clear in the box below.
question.content: How many data subjects records are you expecting to be shared with or by the vendor in the service provided? (on an annual basis or at any one time)

question.description: If you know that your customer or colleague base is in one of these regions or that your advertising is focused in one of these regions please select that region.
question.content: Where will the majority of the targeted data subjects be based?

question.friendlyName: Nature of data sharing between Informa and Vendor
question.description: This helps the Privacy team to understand what responsibilities lie with your team, and which will lie with the vendor.
question.content: What type of data sharing relationship will you have with the vendor?

sections.name: 4. About the Data involved in this engagement

header.name: 5. How the vendor will perform this service.

question.content: In which of the following regions will the vendor be accessing, storing or other processing the personal data involved in this engagement?
Will the vendor be hosting Informa data in order to provide the service?

question.friendlyName: Data Centre Location for this engagement
question.content: Where will the data be hosted?

question.attributes: {"attributeId":"eb7d2511-50e7-42fd-8f63-d815a0677307","fieldName":"attributeSingleSelectValue.value11","name":"Informa Data Transfer mechanism to vendor for engagement","nameKey":"OneTrustApp.VRM.Engagement.Attributes.7b526558-7887-4d90-a660-c39aad859084","attributeType":"none","responseType":"single-select","displayAnswerType":"button","showQuestionDetailsLink":false,"requireJustification":false,"allowLaws":true}
question.friendlyName: Informa Data Transfer mechanism to vendor for engagement
question.content: If Informa personal data will be transferred to the vendor in another country, which transfer mechanism will be used?
Where the vendor is carrying out processing in multiple locations please explain what aspects of the processing the vendor will carry out in each location?

question.friendlyName: Vendor uses sub-processors for this engagement
question.content: Does this vendor engage third parties to help it carry out this service?

question.friendlyName: Vendor Confirms Subprocessor DPA's in place Y/N
question.content: Has the vendor confirmed that they have appropriate DPAs in place when they share Informa data with third parties?

question.friendlyName: Locations of sub-processors for this engagement
question.content: In which regions will the sub-processors access, store or process Informa data?

sections.name: 5. How the vendor will perform this service.

question.description: The size of the organisation will in some cases indicated privacy requirements such as registration or Data protection officer appointment.
question.content: How many employees does the vendor have (approximately)?

question.friendlyName: Vendor has DPO or equivalent privacy lead

options.option: No - Privacy is handled ad hoc at this vendor.
options.hint: Often the case for very small vendors.

options.option: Yes - Vendor has a formal DPO
Yes - Vendor has a privacy lead.
options.hint: Who is NOT a formal DPO

question.content: Which of the following does the vendor have?

question.friendlyName: DPO or Equivalent (Privacy Lead if no DPO)
question.content: Please provide name and email address for the vendor Data Protection Officer or Equivalent (Privacy Lead if no DPO)

options.option: Yes - Vendor has a general privacy policy.
options.hint: I.e. one referring to the general handling of personal data of its customers.

options.option: Yes - Vendor has a specific policy relating to this service.
options.hint: I.e. one that tells customers about this particular processing activity.

question.content: Does the vendor have a privacy policy?
Please provide the Privacy Policy or Statement Link.
Does the vendor conduct formal Privacy training and awareness activities?
Please describe how often vendor employees are trained on privacy, what areas are covered and what the usual or average percentage completion rate they have in any given time period?
Is the vendor accredited to any privacy or security standard such as BSB - PIMS ISO 270117, ISO 27701 BS 10012 or equivalent?
Please list/explain what accreditations or certifications the vendor organisation holds?

question.friendlyName: Is registered with a data protection supervisory authority Y/N

question.friendlyName: Data protection supervisory authority registration number
question.content: What is the data protection supervisory authority registration number?

question.content: Does the vendor regulate which teams/individuals access Informa personal data?
Please describe how access is regulated - who within your organisation will have access to Informa personal data?

Please ask your vendor for details of the breach?

question.friendlyName: Engagement Agreement - Addendum or Contract Status
question.content: What is the status of the agreement with the vendor?

question.description: If you do not have an agreement/contract to upload please change your answer to the previous question to proceed.
question.content: Please upload a copy of your agreement with the vendor, including the data processing agreement.
Who in the legal team has most recently looked at this vendor agreement?

options.option: Infosec Assessment for this vendor is in progress.
No infosec assessment (infosec yet to be consulted)

question.content: What is the status of the Infosec assessment?
What type of retention policy is in place for this service?
